tool_description: The XSS Shield API provides a realtime cross-site scripting (XSS) detection service that scans input data for suspicious characters and prevents XSS attacks. It offers two endpoints for handling GET and POST requests.
title: XSS Shield

api_list.name: POST Detect
api_list.description: This endpoint detects and prevents XSS attacks in input data sent via JSON payload.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xss-shield.p.rapidapi.com/detect/batch"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xss-shield.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
